Articles.Content:
Does anyone know where I can change the color of the EVA suit visor? I don't really like the yellow one
I've been looking all over GameData/Squad and I can't find anything

I think to do that you need to use a mod like Texture Replacer along with a texture pack for visors.

You can't just change it with some stock setting in game, no...

22 minutes ago, JoE Smash said:

I think to do that you need to use a mod like Texture Replacer along with a texture pack for visors.

You can't just change it with some stock setting in game, no...

I actually have custom suits using Texture Replacer, but they don't have any visor textures
